title: What are hidden files on Android? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hidden files are basically files with a ‘.’ before its name. Any file can be made hidden this way. Like for example, a file called 'abcd.mp4′ can be hidden by renaming it as ‘.abcd.mp4′. However I guess to view these files you have to use better file managers like es file manager. It can also be viewed by connecting the phone to a PC. ES file manager provides a better way to hide files. After encryption is done by ES, the file can only be viewed by decrypting it by ES itself.
